snippet.title: Chip's Challenge 2 - Trailer
snippet.description:
After 25 years Chip's Challenge 2 is finally released:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/348300/

Chip is back and this time he's teamed up with Melinda to try and solve even more puzzles built from a combination of new and old monster, hazards and game elements created by Valadmir Gerajkec - The Puzzle Master.
